description:
Dash loves to imitate the colorful fireflies at Firefly Lagoon.  
Help Dash match the different colors as they fly by!

puzzles.description: Make Dash automatically play a curious sound then automatically turn the lights off.

hints.description: Tap the sound and choose something for Dash to say. Link the states with Auto cues.

puzzles.description: After turning the lights off, make Dash randomly choose to turn on orange, magenta, or green lights.

hints.description: Link the Lights Off state to the three colored lights using Random Link cues.

puzzles.description: After each colored light, make Dash wait for 1.0 s then turn the lights off again.

hints.description: Link each of the colored lights back to the Lights Off state using Wait For cues set to 1.0 s.

puzzles.description: After turning the lights off, make Dash randomly choose to turn around then automatically play the sound again.

hints.description: Link the Lights Off state to the Turn Around state using a Random Link cue. Link the Turn Around state to the sound using an Auto cue.
